C D G I M P R S T 

S

setAlbum(String) - Method in class Song
The mutator method for the Song's album name
setArtist(String) - Method in class Song
The mutator method for the Song's artist
setData(Song) - Method in class SongNode
The mutator method for the references to the Song that the SongNode is holding
setLength(int) - Method in class Song
The mutator method for the Song's duration length, the given length to set the Song's duration to must be a valid length which must be greater than 0 seconds or else it will throw an InvalidLengthException
setName(String) - Method in class Song
The mutator method for the Song's name
setNext(SongNode) - Method in class SongNode
The mutator method for the references to the next SongNode of this SongNode
setPrev(SongNode) - Method in class SongNode
The mutator method for the references to previous SongNode of this SongNode
shuffle() - Method in class SongLinkedList
Randomly shuffles the order of the songs contained within the playlist
Song - Class in <Unnamed>
The Song class will be modeling a song in a playlist, which will contain multiple songs.
Song() - Constructor for class Song
Default constructor of the Song class, it is just used to created a Song object that have empty attributes so that the user can set it later after it is created using the mutator methods
Song(String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class Song
The parameterized constructor of the Song class in which the Song object is made with the given information
SongLinkedList - Class in <Unnamed>
The SongLinkedList class represent the whole Doubly-Linked List class that holds Song object as data for each node.
SongLinkedList() - Constructor for class SongLinkedList
Default constructor of the SongLinkedList, all of the values are set to default, the head, tail, and cursor will all be set to null and the size will be set to 0 because there is no element in the Linked-List in the beginning
SongNode - Class in <Unnamed>
The SongNode class is a node wrapper class for the Song object, it will essentially make up one node of a doubly linked list that overall represent a play list.
SongNode() - Constructor for class SongNode
Default constructor of the SongNode class, it will just created a SongNode object with all of the variables, including the references to the previous node, the references to the next node, and the Song it contains to null.
SongNode(Song) - Constructor for class SongNode
Parameterized constructor of the SongNode class, it will constructor a SongNode object with a specified Song to be stored inside the SongNode.
stopClip() - Method in class SongLinkedList
This method will stop the Clip c that is used by the SongLinkedList from playing
